::Killfest::

Killfest frowns, looking down at Scorponok, then over to DrillBit. He 
was slowly getting used to talking to bots nearly half his size. 
Diamond, the first bot he had met on this planet, had been about as 
tall as Scorponok, half as tall as Killfest himself. And yet, he 
reminded himself drily, she assassinated KitKat, the Predacon leader, 
and cast the Predacons into civil war. Small bots could have large 
impacts.

"Hmm. Yes, if we want to take that base, we will need to scout with 
only one bot. Losing one bot is preffereble to losing twenty."

He looks at Darkfate. "Scorponok seems to be willing. Do you have any 
problem with him going?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Then I'll do It" Scorponok blurts out, trying to prove 
himself. "That is,
> if Darkfate approves."
